response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the capability to significantly impact your business positively. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value and the potential benefits it can bring to your endeavors.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you decide to proceed, I assure you that we will provide unparalleled support and service throughout the process. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Thank you for considering our product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
